text:
The BARNARD FORUM is presented as a public service by Barnard College
in cooperation with metropolitan area alumnae groups of the following colleges:

{Please detach along dotted line')
Please send me the following tickets for THE BARNARD FORUM on
February 8, 1958. A check is enclosed for $..
. tickets for Luncheon (12:45 p. m.) and Program at $6.00 per ticket.
. tickets for Program only (2:00 p. m.) at $2.00 per ticket.
Name.
Address.
College.Class.
If you and your guests wish to be seated at luncheon with an alumnae group,
or a particular person, please indicate here.
DEADLINE FOR LUNCHEON RESERVATIONS—FEBRUARY 4
Please detach and mail to: THE BARNARD FORUM
606 West 120th Street
New York 27, New York
Phone: MOnument 2-8992
Make checks payable to:
Barnard College
